## `Agents` 

The getting started with agents samples demonstrate the fundamental concepts and functionalities of single agents and can be used with any agent type.

While the functionality can be used with any agent type, these samples use Azure OpenAI as the AI provider and use ChatCompletion as the type of service.

For other samples that demonstrate how to create and configure each type of agent that come with the agent framework, see the [How to create an agent for each provider](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/blob/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/AgentProviders/README.md) samples.

- [Agent_Step01_Running](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step01_Running)
- [Agent_Step02_MultiturnConversation](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step02_MultiturnConversation)
- [Agent_Step03_UsingFunctionTools](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step03_UsingFunctionTools)
- [Agent_Step04_UsingFunctionToolsWithApprovals](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step04_UsingFunctionToolsWithApprovals)
- [Agent_Step05_StructuredOutput](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step05_StructuredOutput)
- [Agent_Step06_PersistedConversations](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step06_PersistedConversations)
- [Agent_Step07_3rdPartyChatHistoryStorage](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step07_3rdPartyChatHistoryStorage)
- [Agent_Step08_Observability](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step08_Observability)
- [Agent_Step09_DependencyInjection](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step09_DependencyInjection)
- [Agent_Step10_AsMcpTool](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step10_AsMcpTool)
- [Agent_Step11_UsingImages](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step11_UsingImages)
- [Agent_Step12_AsFunctionTool](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step12_AsFunctionTool)
- [Agent_Step13_BackgroundResponsesWithToolsAndPersistence](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step13_BackgroundResponsesWithToolsAndPersistence)
- [Agent_Step14_Middleware](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step14_Middleware)
- [Agent_Step15_Plugins](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step15_Plugins)
- [Agent_Step16_ChatReduction](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step16_ChatReduction)
- [Agent_Step17_BackgroundResponses](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step17_BackgroundResponses)
- [Agent_Step18_DeepResearch](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step18_DeepResearch)
- [Agent_Step19_Declarative](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Agents/Agent_Step19_Declarative)

## `FoundryAgents`

The getting started with Foundry Agents samples demonstrate the fundamental concepts and functionalities of Azure Foundry Agents and can be used with Azure Foundry as the AI provider.

These samples showcase how to work with agents managed through Azure Foundry, including agent creation, versioning, multi-turn conversations, and advanced features like code interpretation and computer use.

- [FoundryAgents_Step01.1_Basics](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step01.1_Basics)
- [FoundryAgents_Step01.2_Running](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step01.2_Running)
- [FoundryAgents_Step02_MultiturnConversation](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step02_MultiturnConversation)
- [FoundryAgents_Step03_UsingFunctionTools](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step03_UsingFunctionTools)
- [FoundryAgents_Step04_UsingFunctionToolsWithApprovals](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step04_UsingFunctionToolsWithApprovals)
- [FoundryAgents_Step05_StructuredOutput](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step05_StructuredOutput)
- [FoundryAgents_Step06_PersistedConversations](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step06_PersistedConversations)
- [FoundryAgents_Step07_Observability](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step07_Observability)
- [FoundryAgents_Step08_DependencyInjection](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step08_DependencyInjection)
- [FoundryAgents_Step09_UsingMcpClientAsTools](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step09_UsingMcpClientAsTools)
- [FoundryAgents_Step10_UsingImages](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step10_UsingImages)
- [FoundryAgents_Step11_AsFunctionTool](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step11_AsFunctionTool)
- [FoundryAgents_Step12_Middleware](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step12_Middleware)
- [FoundryAgents_Step13_Plugins](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step13_Plugins)
- [FoundryAgents_Step14_CodeInterpreter](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step14_CodeInterpreter)
- [FoundryAgents_Step15_ComputerUse](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step15_ComputerUse)
- [FoundryAgents_Step27_LocalMCP](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/main/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/FoundryAgents/FoundryAgents_Step27_LocalMCP)

## `Workflows` 

The getting started with workflow samples demonstrate the fundamental concepts and functionalities of workflows in Agent Framework.

- [_Foundational (start here)](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/_Foundational)
- [Agents](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Agents)
- [Checkpoint](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Checkpoint)
- [Concurrent](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Concurrent)
- [ConditionalEdges](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/ConditionalEdges)
- [Declarative](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Declarative)
- [HumanInTheLoop](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/HumanInTheLoop)
- [Loop](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Loop)
- [Observability](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Observability)
- [Resources](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Resources)
- [SharedStates](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/SharedStates)
- [Visualization](https://github.com/microsoft/agent-framework/tree/fc9c81b0b11170bdab8fa2d42bb96981e65fd270/dotnet/samples/GettingStarted/Workflows/Visualization)
